timeline.bodyText: Please add license headers to all the files.
timeline.author: apanicker-nflx

replies.bodyText: @apanicker-nflx Thanks, added license header as requested
replies.author: skissane

replies.bodyText: @skissane Since the project is open-sourced under Netflix, I believe the license header should use the same name. I understand your concern regarding working on this on company-time, but eventually since this is OSS, it would benefit the community as a whole.
replies.author: apanicker-nflx

replies.bodyText: @apanicker-nflx Can we discuss this on the project chat? I posted a message about it on https://gitter.im/netflix-conductor/community Thanks
replies.author: skissane
